entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Kingston
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 00:04 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kingston Airport 03:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
Temperature: -5.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.8 kPa rising
Humidity: 79 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -8.4°C
Wind: NE 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 6:10 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning. Snow at times heavy beginning in the afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h early in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:10 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 6:10 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023
